description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver (CVE-2024-30012):

1. Download the appropriate updates corresponding to your system version from the links below.
2. Follow the prompts to install the updates.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- The vulnerability can be exploited if an attacker physically interacts with the device, leading to potential remote code execution.
- Ensure your device is running one of the supported builds before applying the updates.

**Update Packages**:
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [Download KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)  
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [Download KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)  
- For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [Download KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that you are on one of the following builds:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
